title: Glory in the Daytime contrasting views

content.question: The technique of opening the passage by contrasting Mr. and Mrs. Murdock’s views on “plays and their players” functions to

choices.label: explore the spectrum of viewpoints concerning the theater
establish an idea that is later negated by details in the text
portray the misogyny of the twentieth century
introduce one character’s opinion that is then developed throughout the passage

content.answer: introduce one character’s opinion that is then developed throughout the passage

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain the function of contrasting characters.
